data.name: Home VR
data.detailed_description:
Home is a thrilling VR stealth game following the story of a little girl trying to escape monsters in her boarding school. Think Alien: Isolation but it's VR, you're a little girl with no weapons and you can hide within walls and objects.

Game Description


Home has a lot of unique features that differentiate it from your average stealth game. For starters, it's very immersive. In Home, you play as a little girl and as a little girl your environment feels way larger to you. This experience is captured beautifully in Home. The gameplay itself is also very interesting as it focuses heavily on avoiding detection/capture by completely ridding you of the ability to attack your enemies.

Features

- VR stealth game
- Built in Unity
- Super immersive experience
- Unique stealth gameplay (hiding within walls, objects)


Interesting Facts

- First VR adventure game from Nigeria (possibly Africa)
- Built entirely by solo developer, Tade Ajiboye

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Core i5-7500 / Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 / RX 580 - 6GB VRAM

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
